message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us at $1,000,000, and its worth to you is equally significant at $1,000,000. Considering its unique features and high demand, we are extending an offer to you at a special price of $950,000. We believe this offer strikes a balance between fair compensation for our product and a favorable deal for you. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
